Kings Park Rangers Football Club is an English football club. Founded in May 2023, they won back-to-back promotions as they were runners up of the Essex and Suffolk Border League Division 1 in 2023-24 and Border League Premier Division winners in 2024â€“25, qualifying them for Step 6 (Level 10) of the National League system for the first time. They play in the Eastern Counties League Division One North and play at Blackhouse Lane, in Great Cornard, a groundshare with Cornard United.
